scripts.dev: npm i && concurrently "cd backend && npm i && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm i && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:force: npm i --force && concurrently "cd backend && npm i --force && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm i --force && npm run dev"
scripts.alert:clean: echo ðŸ“¢ This command will only work in bash based terminals
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:root
scripts.clean:success: echo ðŸ§¹ Cleaned all node_modules folders, you can now run npm run dev to install all dependencies again
scripts.clean: npm run alert:clean && npm run clean:all && npm run clean:success
